channel.title: Our Works on CAPRO
channel.description: Recent content in Our Works on CAPRO

item.title: Lifebrain Global Brain Health Survey
item.description: We conducted the data processing and analyses for all associated reports and publications, and released the data publicly.

item.title: ggseg - Brain atlas in R
item.description: Allows plotting of brain atlas data using ggplot2 in R. Full with extensions for 3d plots, and multiple atlases.

item.title: Nettskjemar
item.description: Enables download of data and meta-data for surveys conducted with the Nettskjema survey tool by the University of Oslo.

item.title: TSD Imaging processing pipeline
item.description: Custom MRI import and processing pipeline for the Center of Lifespan Changes in Brain and Cognition.
